item.description:
Hi All,

Let's climb!

Please note: you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You can take a belay test when you get there. If you have never climbed before, you should take a class at Metrorock. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements to take the class. You can use the message board on this meetup to find other people that want to take the class. The classes do fill up, so please call ahead.

Metrorock charges $16 ($14 with student ID) for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder.

For more information see:
http://www.metrorock....
http://maps.google.co...
The gym also has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station if you don't have a car.

When Metro nearly kicks us out @ 10 pm we usually go for beer/pizza/etc., in Everett or Somerville.

Hope to see you there!
Stephanie

P.S. I'll be around the picnic table until about 7:15 pm, after that you'll have to come find me. Check the whiteboard near the restrooms for description.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group at the picnic table until 7:15 or so.
item.name: Daughter of the Monday Night Climb
